channel.title: Pre-disaster
channel.description:
Hi there! I'm fairly new to designing levels in SDK, at the moment i'm just creating rooms and adding things, such as doors, one step at a time. I seem to recall that working in Worldcraft with maps for Half-Life 1 presented one with the possibility of having the NPCs react pre-disaster. This was done by ticking a box called "Pre-disaster" Is this possible to achive in SDK? I've search high and low across google, and returned with nothing... Would some kind soul help me out here?
Thanks!

item.title: Pre-disaster
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Depending on which game you’re mapping for, you can probably set stuff like this with an env_global. IIRC, in HL2 it has “Gordon Pre-criminal” which was used to make NPCs treat him like just another citizen in C17 - this was used to the same effect as the Pre-disaster flag in was in HL.
If you’re mapping for BM, I think there might actually be a predisaster setting in the env_global.
